page.title: 20Urban and Rural Rubbish.
page.content: People don't take enough trouble to care for Street. There are enough litter bins around but rubbish is dumped in the street or drains because some can't be bothered to use bins. Young people are often to blame because teenagers who leave school jobless often hang around in the High Street and write on walls. Litter does not occur only in the town but also in the country. Examples found are tin baths, sinks, rolls of carpet and cars. Lots of rubbish gets into streams and pollutes the water killing the fish. Of litter, graffiti, rubbish and vandalism, vandalism is worst because graffiti can be painted over, litter rots into the ground and rubbish is often picked up. Vandalism is worst because it costs so much to put right.
